typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerNo as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		Location as string,
		Inserteddate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> customer
source(output(
		customerkey as integer,
		CustomerNo as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		Location as string,
		updateddate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dimcustomer
customer, dimcustomer lookup(customer@CustomerNo == dimcustomer@CustomerNo,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(updateddate = iif(isNull(Inserteddate),Inserteddate,currentUTC())) ~> LASTUPDDT
LASTUPDDT alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customerkey as integer,
		CustomerNo as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		Location as string,
		updateddate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerNo'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerNo = customer@CustomerNo,
		CustomerName = customer@CustomerName,
		Location = customer@Location,
		updateddate
	)) ~> target
